title: Add background image upload support for CYOA scenes
description:
Allow authors to upload and use background images for their CYOA scenes, enhancing the visual storytelling experience.

Features:
- File upload interface for background images
- Support for common image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP)
- Image preview in the editor
- Ability to overlay text on the background image
- Image optimization for Bluesky posting
- Store/retrieve uploaded images for reuse

title: Fix light/dark mode UI readability issues
description:
Improve the light/dark mode handling to ensure all UI elements are readable in both modes.

Issues:
- Current browser default (dark mode) causes some UI elements to be unreadable
- Need better contrast for text and backgrounds
- Ensure form elements, buttons, and status messages are visible in both modes
- Fix any color combinations that don't work well in dark mode
- Test and validate both light and dark modes thoroughly

Requirements:
- All text should be readable against backgrounds
- Form inputs should have proper contrast
- Status messages should be clearly visible
- Thread view posts should be distinguishable
- Maintain consistent visual hierarchy in both modes

title: Thread-based navigation UI for CYOA authoring
description:
Build a drill-down interface for authoring CYOA branches - showing the selected path through the story hierarchy with an editor at the bottom to add new branches.

Features:
- Show posted scene at the top after posting
- Display replies automatically below the main post
- Click on any reply or original post to open editor for that context
- Build up chains by selecting replies and adding new ones
- Show hierarchical path of current selections (not full tree)
- Editor component works for both top-level posts and replies

title: Add ability to load existing thread by URL
description:
Allow users to paste in a Bluesky thread URL to load an existing CYOA thread and continue working on it.

Features:
- Input field to paste a Bluesky post URL
- Load button to fetch the thread
- Parse the thread and populate the thread navigation
- Set the loaded post as the root post
- Fetch and display all replies in the hierarchy
- Allow continuing the story from any point in the existing thread
